pullrequest.title: Use QShortcuts for keyboard shortcuts, resolving issue #59

content.raw:
This fixes issue #59, but the functionality is altered in the following ways:

* The Engage button is not depressed when the F5 key is.
* The engage signal is sent at key press rather than key release.

Might this be why you were handling these events independently? In any case, I’m fine with this new functionality.
